content: In former days, men sold themselves to the Devil to acquire magical powers. Nowadays they acquire those powers from science, and find themselves compelled to become devils.
translations: ita:Nei tempi antichi, gli uomini si vendevano al Diavolo per acquisire poteri magici. Al giorno d'oggi acquisiscono tali po
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Scott (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
